column4: can someone tell me why my terminal quits immediately after starting?its an error , has anyone encountered it?
can someone tell me why my terminal quits immediately after starting?its an error , has anyone encountered it?
how are you starting the terminal? is an error message visible?
might be worth heading to the console. try "ctrl-alt-F1" (you can type "alt-F7" to get back), and then try logging in.
